mapper.select: SELECT g.* FROM admin a INNER JOIN admin_role b ON a.`admin_id`=b.`admin_id` INNER JOIN role c ON b.`role_id`=c.`role_id` INNER JOIN role_permission d ON c.`role_id`=d.`role_id` INNER JOIN permission e ON d.`permission_id`=e.`permission_id` INNER JOIN permission_menu f ON e.`permission_id`=f.`permission_id` INNER JOIN menu g ON f.`menu_id`=g.`menu_id` WHERE a.`admin_id`=#{admin_id}
